text: ## Secondary Transactions involving the Promoters, Promoter Group and the Selling Shareholders

Except as disclosed in “- Build-up of the Promoters' Contribution” on page 100 and as set out below, there are no secondary transactions of Equity Shares by our Promoters, the members of the Promoter Group and Selling Shareholders since incorporation of our Company:
